title: Duke: Could See Fed's Powell Stay Until 2028
description: Betsy Duke, former Fed governor and former Wells Fargo chair, says any nomination to succeed Jay Powell would be complicated, adding it is hard to see Powell leaving the Fed board and allowing his seat to be filled by someone he may not have confidence in. She speaks with Romaine Bostick on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
